alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 10:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WAKULLA...JEFFERSON... NORTHWESTERN TAYLOR...SOUTHEASTERN LEON...NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1057 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Woodville, moving southwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Cody, Wakulla Springs, South City, Medart, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Natural Bridge, Liveoak Island, and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
